name: untilyouaresonude
text: Amazing way to describe the terrors of a hangover.

name: saint
text: ...and amazing way to describe Ray's life. Genius.

name: greyfield
text: I have known many people whose lives are best described as neverending sojourns into telephone poles. After a while, you stop thinking about how much of a douche you are and appreciate their misery. It's the best kind of schadenfreude.

name: nolley
text: Terrors?

name: untilyouaresonude
text: Yes...when it's that bad, you're actually afraid of it.

name: spinynorman
text:
Although Withnail & I comes close with the "I feel like a pig shat in my head," Alka-Selter between the brain-cheeks is a pretty adequate description of it.

The thing is, a real hangover just don't go for the headbone - it plays your whole body like a marimba, making sure to dwell on the stomach and the gut-bits. It's a soul-miasma, that's what it is. You are useless for at least a day.

name: tellumo
text: Ray has a bastard behind the eyes.

name: farqussus
text: Don't forget the southern gangster rapper in your ass who SPITS HOT FIRE

name: spinynorman
text: Oh man, that metaphor threw me for a loop. Fucking great.

name: fattypneumonia
text:
Ain't but five rappers in the WORLD that can SPIT HOT FIRE:

[IMGS OFF]

Dylon, Dylon, Dylon, Dylon, and DYLON.

name: radchillies
text: Holy God, that was the best description of anything I have ever read, ever. You sir, need to work for Webster's.

name: jhunter
text: Also, "my head feels like there's a frenchman living in it"

name: mikeronomicon
text: I always felt like more like I had been repeatedly run over by a bus-load of circus midgets who then leapt out and beat my remains half to death, while a nearby clown kills kittens.

name: quantumcasaba
text: Oh god, those first couple hours where you know it hasn't peaked yet, and no amount of water or aid will stop its progress.. the horror, the horror.

name: psykeres
text: I still want to know about that amount of carrot.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Heh! Let me just remove that.

name: falseprophet
text: Beef can only estimate in general terms the degree of Ray's carrot-earness, but Teodor is able to quantify to exact measurements that Ray smells like six and exactly six asses. He's a man of science like that.

name: laikalost
text: Not five or seven, mind you.  Six.  Six asses.

name: falseprophet
text: Six! Six asses! Ah. Ah. Ah.

name: mattbeetee
text: You just won all the awards.

name: ted0phile
text: The person who lamed this wasn't allowed to watch television as a child.

name: slab64
text: A comment left by slab64 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by thomgreenwood, lyss, Teabag_Mel)

name: fancyrat
text: Teodor has made some sweet comparisons about Ray's smell in this arc.

name: mal3
text: This won't make sense in six months, but I swear to Eris the angry, waving pill is controlling the weiner dog with telekinesis !

name: invidious
text: Awesome observation.

name: antsama
text: Beef is so used to Ray's behaviour that he has come up with experiential jokes to keep himself busy.

name: expellens
text: Beef has a history of being a dick when Ray is hung-over.

name: hannah
text: exactly six asses. no more, no less.

name: paco
text: "Like watching a loop of a kid riding his bike into a telephone pole" -wonderful

name: relaxing
text: Thanks to YouTube the whole world now knows exactly what Beef describes.  Achewood, always ahead of its time.

name: sp1derbaby
text: Oh man! So many videos! This one is classic.

name: rawk5tar
text: Daaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaad! *clomp*

name: puguglypress
text: WHERE'S HIS PRECIOUS AMERICA NOW???

name: pseudonymjones
text: A comment left by pseudonymjones was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by theuberwalrus, madnes, riotdejaneiro, heccibiggs, Overmedicated, Deusoma, goocifer, rowboat, Girdag, trisha, farqussus, XI, pitseleh, snoozebar, CanusDivinus, luckypyjamas, nipsy43, kledermans, Zem, Wulvaine, bixschmix, smilebuddha, yingkaixing, pogo, morbo, Crimson_King)

name: peterjoel
text: A comment left by peterjoel was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by mysterymeat1001, riotdejaneiro, glorify, GeyserShitdick, rowboat, Latterman, XI, luckypyjamas, nipsy43, Wulvaine, smilebuddha, PoodleLucy, yingkaixing)

name: rowboat
text: A comment left by rowboat was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Overmedicated, farqussus, Lumus, achilleselbow, yingkaixing, QuantumCasaba, pogo, ovenface)

name: achilleselbow
text: A comment left by achilleselbow was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Crater12, Wulvaine, Satyr)

name: rowboat
text: A comment left by rowboat was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Lumus, nipsy43, ZedPower, Crater12, mugi, usversusthem)

name: overmedicated
text: Dude, you're trying too hard.

name: rowboat
text: When I've tried too hard you'll know it, sister.

name: rowboat
text: This little exchange is pretty hilarious in hindsight.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: YES

name: canusdivinus
text: Oh lord, how many times have I said that one in my head... Well phrased, my friend, well phrased.

name: taiiga
text: after reading this strip i've found the opportunity to tell many people they smell like six asses.

name: kreuzkopf
text: Roast Beef can tell it is not Ray but H.H. since Ray would never crinkle a suit.

name: serf
text:
six asses.

fukken brilliant

name: dersquirrel
text: the dude has no mercy.

name: sidxdeadgod
text:
Haha the krinkling as he goes down.
Fackin hilarious.

name: luckypyjamas
text: A comment left by luckypyjamas was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by pkitty, farqussus, Vee, thatcrazycommie)

name: fmercury
text: I think this strip has more brilliant lines per capita than any other.

name: stuart
text: Actually, I think the one preceding it deserves this honor more. That or the one where Ray confuses the First and Tenth Amendments.

name: droplede
text: Emergency Denny's may seem like the answer. But it's not. It is SO not. Never is. 2 Moons Over My-Hammy has no power to extinguish the intra-lobal Alka-Seltzer.

name: charchar
text: Denny's is never the answer.

name: mattylite
text: ...not even when stated in the form of a question, as a reply to something Alex Trebek said to you while you were on TV.

name: boredom_man
text: Teodor, at what restaurant did a waiter make my wife smile like a donut?

name: slickshoes3234
text:
My two favorite aspects of the strip are:
-Ray's Newspaper suit has a tie;
-it looks somewhat like he's wearing 3-D glasses (how do you get one dirty lens??)

name: hypoluxa
text:
Mine is "The Hangover Ham".
I love it when Achewood gives me a new phrase to use in my everyday life.

name: bizarro8mybaby
text: I wish I had as many imaginary friends to explain Concepts as Beef does.  Hangover Ham and Samuel H. Invisible have probably taken him to Denny's dozens of times.

name: drskradley
text: It sucks to smell like six asses.

name: oyster
text: Brains look like behinds. Achewood taught me this.

name: slalvation
text: This strip reminds me of that one episode of Futurama where half of my favorite jokes in the series happen in about five minutes.

name: c_dizzle
text: ...what the hell are brain cheeks? :c.

name: nutmeg
text: the right and left hemispheres resemble, to Ray, right and left ass cheeks, and he visualizes his headache as some alka-seltzer producing much fizzing agony in the asshole of his brain (figuratively).

name: c_dizzle
text: my eyes are opened! thank ye.

name: bizarro8mybaby
text: Ray believes in head-ass symmetry.

name: cinderfella
text: Whining doesn't help. Denny's? No chance. Only solution: Skip a day.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: we all wish we could skip a day.

name: thequietyou
text:
"Also mention something about the carrot" made me laugh so loud I woke the wife.

Beef can only have his one-track mind derailed by a different singular track.

name: crankheart
text: this is it...the favorite. the 3rd and 4th panels sealed this comic for me forever.

name: wonelove
text: Beef wants Ray to whine this one out

name: kennisiou
text:
This is the sixth time I have read this comic, and it wasn't until just now that I realized that "Hangover Ham" was not Beef trying to say Ray had a hangover like a ham in his head, but that he was "hamming up" how painful the hangover was.

I still want to make or find a recipe for "hangover ham" somewhere, just because.
